user.title: AsusWRT
user.description: Set required parameter to connect to your router

data.name: [%key:common::config_flow::data::name%]
data.ssh_key: Path to your SSH key file (instead of password)

error.pwd_and_ssh: Only provide password or SSH key file
error.pwd_or_ssh: Please provide password or SSH key file

abort.invalid_unique_id: Impossible to determine a valid unique id for the device
abort.no_unique_id: A device without a valid unique id is already configured. Configuration of multiple instance is not possible

data.consider_home: Seconds to wait before considering a device away
data.interface: The interface that you want statistics from (e.g. eth0,eth1 etc)
data.dnsmasq: The location in the router of the dnsmasq.leases files
data.require_ip: Devices must have IP (for access point mode)
